sections.heading: Violations; civil penalty; investigation; State Fire Marshal; committee; duties; hearing; civil penalty; costs
sections.text: (1) Until September 1, 2024:(a) Any person who violates section 76-2320, 76-2320.01, 76-2320.02, 76-2321, 76-2322, 76-2323, 76-2326, 76-2330, or 76-2331 shall be subject to a civil penalty
